projects.title: E-Commerce Racing Platform
projects.description: A high-performance e-commerce platform built for speed, featuring real-time inventory management, lightning-fast search, and seamless checkout experience. Optimized for peak traffic conditions.
projects.shortDescription: Lightning-fast e-commerce platform with real-time features
problems: Reduced page load times by 60% through optimized caching strategies
Implemented real-time inventory tracking preventing overselling
Built scalable architecture handling 10k+ concurrent users

projects.title: AI Racing Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Machine learning powered dashboard that analyzes racing performance data, predicts optimal strategies, and provides real-time insights. Features advanced data visualization and predictive modeling.
projects.shortDescription: ML-powered racing analytics with predictive insights
problems: Developed ML models with 95% accuracy in performance prediction
Created interactive visualizations processing 1M+ data points
Implemented real-time data streaming with sub-second latency

projects.title: Mobile Racing Companion
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application providing race tracking, team communication, and performance monitoring. Features offline capability and real-time synchronization across devices.
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform mobile app for race tracking and team communication
problems: Reduced battery consumption by 40% through optimization
Implemented secure real-time messaging for 500+ teams

projects.title: Racing Event Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive backend system managing racing events, participant registration, scoring, and live updates. Built for high availability and real-time performance tracking.
projects.shortDescription: Scalable backend system for racing event management
problems: Built fault-tolerant system handling 50k+ concurrent connections
Implemented real-time scoring with microsecond precision
Designed scalable microservices architecture on Kubernetes
